text_blocks.content:
Fwd: news article pm MCC release
From Kevin Pistro
To Hugh Hurwitz, Michael Carvajal, Ray Ormond
Date 2019/08/15 13:55
Subject: Fwd: news article pm MCC release
Attachments: TEXT.htm
FYSA. Apparently came out early this morning.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email forwarded by Kevin Pistro to Hugh Hurwitz, Michael Carvajal, and Ray Ormond. The email contains a link to a news article about an inmate being mistakenly released from MCC after Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
